Package com.nexmo.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NexmoCallEventListener
    NexmoCallEventListener dispatches events related to a NexmoCall.
    NexmoConversationListener
    NexmoConversationListener dispatches events related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoCustomEventListener
    NexmoCustomEventListener dispatches a NexmoCustomEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoDTMFEventListener
    NexmoDTMFEventListener dispatches a NexmoDTMFEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoIncomingCallListener
    NexmoIncomingCallListener dispatches a NexmoCall related to NexmoClient.
    NexmoLegStatusEventListener
    NexmoLegStatusEventListener dispatches a NexmoLegStatusEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMediaActionEventListener
    NexmoMediaActionEventListener dispatches a NexmoMediaActionEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMediaEventListener
    NexmoMediaEventListener dispatches a NexmoMediaEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMemberEventListener
    NexmoMemberEventListener dispatches a NexmoMemberEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMessageEventListener
    NexmoMessageEventListener dispatches a NexmoEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoPushEventListener
    NexmoPushEventListener dispatches a NexmoEvent related to NexmoClient.
    NexmoReceiveConversationListener
    NexmoReceiveConversationListener dispatches a NexmoCall related to NexmoClient.
    NexmoTypingEventListener
    NexmoTypingEventListener dispatches a NexmoTypingEvent related to a NexmoConversation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Defaults
    Defaults.
    NexmoAttachmentEvent
    Represents the attachment events that can be sent to a NexmoConversation (currently only images).
    NexmoCall
    The NexmoCall class is a NexmoConversation for phone calls, created by NexmoClient.call(String, NexmoCallHandler, NexmoRequestListener), or received from NexmoIncomingCallListener.onIncomingCall(NexmoCall).
    NexmoCallMember
    Represents the NexmoMember inside of a NexmoCall.
    NexmoChannel
    Connects the user to the NexmoConversation
    NexmoClient
    The NexmoClient is the main entry point into the SDK and is instantiated to use the NexmoConversation API in your application.
    NexmoClient.Builder
    Builds new NexmoClient
    NexmoClient.NexmoClientConfig
    The settings to initialise the SDK (has to be built by Builder)
    NexmoConversation
    The NexmoConversation class is a container of communications, created by NexmoClient.newConversation(String, String, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoConversationsPage
    Represents a list of NexmoConversations, created by the response from NexmoClient.getConversations(Integer, NexmoPageOrder, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoCustomEvent
    Represents a custom event, dispatched into NexmoCustomEventListener.
    NexmoDeletedEvent
    Represents deleted events, sent by NexmoTextEvent.delete(NexmoRequestListener) and NexmoAttachmentEvent.delete(NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoDeliveredEvent
    Represents a delivered receipt for an event, available for NexmoTextEvent and NexmoAttachmentEvent.
    NexmoDirection
    Directional Data from CS (type and extra properties)
    NexmoDTMFEvent
    Represents a DTMF event, dispatched into NexmoDTMFEventListener.
    NexmoEvent
    Represents the base class from which all Event classes are derived.
    NexmoEventsPage
    Represents a list of NexmoEvents, created by the response from NexmoConversation.getEvents(Integer, NexmoPageOrder, String, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoImageRepresentation
    The NexmoAttachmentEvent is defined by three Image Representations: NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.ORIGINAL, NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.ORIGINAL and NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.THUMBNAIL.
    NexmoInitiator
    The NexmoInitiator is the initiator of the member to a specific NexmoMemberState inside a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoLeg
    Represents the media stream id in a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoLegStatusEvent  
    NexmoMedia
    Represents the media state of a NexmoMember in a NexmoConversation
    NexmoMediaActionEvent
    Represents the mute and earmuff media events dispatched into NexmoMediaActionEventListener.
    NexmoMediaEvent
    Represents the answer and hangup media events dispatched into NexmoMediaActionEventListener.
    NexmoMember
    An individual user (conversation member).
    NexmoMemberEvent
    Represents events related to member state in a conversation (invited, joined, left).
    NexmoSeenEvent
    Represents a seen receipt for an event, available for NexmoTextEvent and NexmoAttachmentEvent.
    NexmoTextEvent  
    NexmoTypingEvent
    Represents the typing state in a conversation: ON/OFF are sent with NexmoConversation.startTyping() and NexmoConversation.stopTyping().
    NexmoUser
    Represents a unique user in the context of a Nexmo Application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NexmoCallHandler
    An enum to represent call types.
    NexmoCallMemberStatus
    An enum to represent the NexmoCallMember's current call status.
    NexmoChannelType
    An enum to represent channel type for a NexmoMember.
    NexmoConnectionState
    An enum to represent the connection status for a NexmoConnectionListener.
    NexmoDirection.Type
    Enum to represent channel type for a NexmoDirection
    NexmoEventType
    Enum to represent the type of the event for a NexmoEvent.
    NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE
    NexmoImageRepresentation
    NexmoMediaActionState  
    NexmoMediaActionType  
    NexmoMediaState  
    NexmoMediaType  
    NexmoMemberState  
    NexmoMemberUpdatedType
    Enum to represent the different types of updates to a NexmoMember.
    NexmoPageOrder
    Enum to represent the order of the NexmoConversationsPage or NexmoEventsPage.
    NexmoTypingState  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NexmoClientException  
    NexmoClientExceptionAlreadyBuilt
